name: Looking For Simon
description:
Mini adventure based on a true story.

Looking for Simon is a  journey that takes you into the harrowing experience of trying to find the host at an event after party.  Explore and mingle as you try to piece together the simple clues to find Simon.

Created mostly in a pub in the sunny city of Perth, Scotland, using Bitsy, my mobile phone and a bit of patience. 

Thanks for playing!
